{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21744v1", "title": "Jet Modification and Medium Response -- Theory Overview", "summary": "This text contains a summary and personal perspective on the current status
and challenges of jet quenching physics as portrayed by the presentations
delivered at the 12th International Conference on Hard and Electromagnetic
Probes of High-Energy Nuclear Collisions (Hard Probes 2024) which took place in
September 2024 in Nagasaki, Japan.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-30T15:39:15Z"}
